aleksandr-sokolovskiy.title: Alexander Sokolovskiy
aleksandr-sokolovskiy.text:
üìå Main blog themes:

  • Entrepreneurship and startups: conversations with founders of famous companies such as Gett, Hoff, VkusVill about business creation and development.
  • Psychology and personal growth: discussions with coaches and psychologists on self-realization, burnout, and finding meaning.
  • Culture and creativity: interviews with artists, musicians, and athletes about the path to success and inner motivation.
  • Life lessons: deep conversations about overcoming difficulties, finding oneself, and the balance between career and personal life.

orkhan-mustafaev.title: Orkhan Mustafaev
orkhan-mustafaev.text:
üìå Main blog themes:

  • Searching for life's work and calling
  • Self-development and psychological resilience
  • Overcoming fear and imposter syndrome
  • Mindfulness, self-love, balance in life
  • Interviews with entrepreneurs, psychologists, artists
  • Creating and promoting content

huberman-lab-na-russkom-yazyke.title: Huberman Lab in Russian
huberman-lab-na-russkom-yazyke.text:
üî¨ Main podcast themes:

  • Neuroscience and brain functions: how the brain manages perception, behavior, and health.
  • Sleep and circadian rhythms: recommendations for improving sleep quality and recovery.
  • Focus and motivation: methods for increasing concentration and resilience to stress.
  • Physical health and endurance: scientific approaches to training, recovery, and nutrition.
  • Mental health: tools for dealing with anxiety, depression, and addictions.
  • Neuroplasticity and learning: how to form new habits and skills.

üéß Where to listen:

  • YouTube: Huberman Lab Podcast in Russian ‚Äî a playlist with translated episodes.
  • Spotify: Huberman Lab ‚Äî original episodes in English.
  • Apple Podcasts: Huberman Lab ‚Äî original episodes in English.

libolibo.title: Liboüî∫Libo
libolibo.text:
üî¨ Main podcast themes:

  • Neurobiology and behavior: studies of brain function, memory, sleep, and decision-making.
  • Genetics and biotechnology: for example, growing brain organoids from skin cells.
  • Ecology and evolution: how animals adapt to the environment and what that says about us.
  • Science during crises: the impact of war and political events on the scientific community.

ted-na-russkom.title: TED in Russian
ted-na-russkom.text:
üìå Main blog themes:

  • Science and technology: latest discoveries and research presented in accessible language.
  • Psychology and self-development: tips for improving quality of life and understanding oneself.
  • Education and innovation: ideas changing the approach to learning and development.
  • Social and cultural issues: reflections on modern society and its future.

aleksey-golubev.title: Alexey Golubev
aleksey-golubev.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main podcast themes:

  • Health and fitness: advice from doctors and trainers on improving physical condition and lifestyle.
  • Psychology and self-development: discussion of mental health, motivation, and personal growth.
  • Business and career: interviews with entrepreneurs and specialists about the path to success and professional development.
  • Social and cultural issues: conversations on current topics in society and culture.

asel-mashanova.title: Asel Mashanova
asel-mashanova.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main podcast themes:

  • Health and self-knowledge ‚Äî how to hear your body, take care of yourself, and live in balance.
  • Integrative medicine and biohacking ‚Äî how to combine science and mindfulness in body and mind care.
  • Entrepreneurship with soul ‚Äî how to build a business based on values and sincerity.
  • Femininity and vulnerability ‚Äî open conversations about personal experience, pain, acceptance, and strength.
  • Psychology and spirituality ‚Äî inner transformations, fears, self-acceptance, and the path to harmony.
  • Asel's personal journey ‚Äî lessons, crises, insights, and inspiration from her life.

financegramm.title: FinanceGramm
financegramm.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main themes of the FinanceGramm podcast:

  • Financial literacy: simple and clear explanations of how to manage money, avoid debt, and plan a budget.
  • Investing: fundamental principles of long-term investing, compound interest, building a diversified portfolio.
  • Psychology of money: the influence of emotions on financial decisions, how to overcome fear, not succumb to panic, and invest with a cool head.
  • Stories of great investors: voiced lectures by Buffett, Dalio, Lynch, and others ‚Äî how they think and make decisions.
  • Practical strategies: how to start investing from scratch, what mistakes to avoid, and how to form financial habits.

nikolay-chernobaev.title: Nikolay Chernobaev
nikolay-chernobaev.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main podcast themes:

  • Entrepreneurship and career: stories of people who built their business from scratch, overcoming difficulties and achieving success.
  • Creativity and art: conversations with artists, directors, and other creative individuals about the process of creation and inspiration.
  • Psychology and self-development: discussion of inner barriers, motivation, and the path to personal growth.
  • Spirituality and philosophy: reflections on the meaning of life, faith, and traditional values.
  • Education and learning: questions of self-education, online courses, and developing new skills.

gleb-solomin.title: Gleb Solomin
gleb-solomin.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main podcast themes:

  • Science and technology: discussion of modern scientific discoveries, including astrophysics, neurobiology, and demography.
  • Psychology and mental health: topics related to consciousness, personality, addictions, and inner conflicts.
  • Health and medicine: conversations with experts about disease prevention, bad habits, and health improvement methods.
  • Future and civilization: reflections on technological singularity, contacts with extraterrestrial civilizations, and the fate of humanity.
  • Personal growth and self-development: guest stories about overcoming difficulties, finding oneself, and achieving goals.

arman-yusupov.title: Arman Yusupov
arman-yusupov.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main podcast themes:

  • Psychology and mental health: discussion of inner barriers, depression, self-esteem, and self-confidence.
  • Personal growth and self-development: reflections on goals, habits, discipline, and the search for the meaning of life.
  • Entrepreneurship and career: stories about launching startups, monetizing content, and business development.
  • Education and future skills: discussion of the importance of lifelong learning and developing soft skills.
  • Social and cultural issues: conversations about the influence of social networks, trends, and societal changes.

vselennaya-plyus.title: Vselennaya Plus
vselennaya-plyus.text:
üéôÔ∏è Main podcast themes:

  • Space and astrophysics: discussion of the origin and evolution of the Universe, black holes, parallel worlds, and other cosmic phenomena.
  • Science and technology: analysis of modern scientific discoveries, including research in biology, medicine, and materials science.
  • Psychology and consciousness: reflections on the nature of consciousness, thinking, and their connection with the physical world.
  • Future of humanity: discussion of the prospects for the development of technology, space exploration, and possible future scenarios.
  • Philosophy and worldview: conversations about the meaning of life, man's place in the Universe, and the ethical aspects of scientific progress.
